incident_updates.body: Start time : 23/11/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 24/11/2022 00:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment

Start time : 23/11/2022 21:00 UTC End time : 24/11/2022 05:00 UTC Service impact : Latency will be observed for Brussels customers Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our backbone infrastructure, we will be doing a maintenance our PoP (Point of Presence) in Brussels

Start time : 24/11/2022 00:00 UTC End time : 24/11/2022 02:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some preventive operation on a device of the backbone.

Start time : 24/11/2022 09:00 UTC  End time : 24/10/2022 11:00 UTC  Service impact : None  Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an operation on some equipment of our backbone between Prague and Warsaw.

Start time : 30/11/2022 21:00 UTC End time : 01/12/2022 00:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a version upgrade for multiple network equipment.
Due to an imponderable, we have to postpone the intervention. A future update will indicate the date and time of the operation
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.
